trans-unit.source: Provides theme settings to <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Fornece definições de tema a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The CompositeDesignerTheme class controls the look and feel of a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> object on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]A classe de CompositeDesignerTheme controla o aspeto e funcionalidade de um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>objeto numa superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme"></xref> to associate with the composite designer theme.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme"> </xref> para associar o tema estruturador composto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines the shape that appears at the end of a connector.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que determina a forma que é apresentada no final de um conector.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor"></xref> enumeration value that defines the shape that appears at the end of the connector.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor"> </xref> valor de enumeração que define a forma que é apresentada no final do conector.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> of the connector.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> do conector.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> object that contains information about the height and width of the connector.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> objeto que contém informações sobre a altura e largura do conector.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines the shape that appears at the beginning of a connector.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que determina a forma que aparece no início de um conector.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor"></xref> enumeration value that defines the shape that appears at the beginning of the connector.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor"> </xref> valor de enumeração que define a forma aparece no início do conector.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Liberta os recursos não geridos utilizados pelo <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme"> </xref> e opcionalmente liberta os recursos geridos.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para libertar recursos geridos e; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para libertar recursos apenas não geridos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> of the expand button on the composite activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> do botão de expansão no designer de atividade composta.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> object that contains information about the height and width of the expand button on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> objeto que contém informações sobre a altura e largura do botão de expansão no <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a brush that defines the background display properties of the expand button on the composite activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um pincel que define as propriedades de visualização de fundo do botão de expansão no designer de atividade composta.

trans-unit.source: If the background brush for the expand button is not set to `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) before GetExpandButtonBackgroundBrush is called, the method disposes of the previous brush and creates a new one.
trans-unit.target: Se o Pincel de fundo para o botão de expansão não está definido como `null` (`Nothing` no Visual Basic) antes de ser chamado GetExpandButtonBackgroundBrush, o método disposes do Pincel anterior e cria um novo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that defines the bounds of the expand button on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que define os limites do botão de expansão no <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A object that uses the rectangle parameter to define the button area in which the brush applies two colors in a linear gradient from the upper-left corner to the lower-right corner of the expand button.
trans-unit.target: A objeto que utiliza o rectangle parâmetro para definir a área de botão na qual o Pincel aplica-se duas cores no gradação linear no canto superior esquerdo para o canto inferior direito do botão de expansão.

trans-unit.source: Performs further initialization tasks beyond those provided by the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Adicional efetua tarefas de inicialização para além dos fornecidos pelo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme.%23ctor%2A> construtor.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.UseOperatingSystemSettings%2A> property is set to `true`, the Initialize method obtains settings for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> object from the operating system.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.UseOperatingSystemSettings%2A>propriedade está definida como `true`, o método de inicialização obtém as definições para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme>objeto do sistema operativo.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.UseOperatingSystemSettings%2A>

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme"></xref> object that the ambient property settings for the designer have changed.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme"> </xref> objeto que foram alteradas as definições de propriedade de ambiente para o estruturador.

trans-unit.source: When this method is called it sets the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BackColorStart%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BackColorEnd%2A> properties to <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: Quando este método é denominado define as <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BackColorStart%2A> <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BackColorEnd%2A>Propriedades para <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty>.</xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BackColorEnd%2A> e</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BackColorStart%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> enumeration determines where a designer theme obtains its ambient property settings.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty>enumeração determina onde um tema estruturador obtém as definições de propriedade de ambiente.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> value is set, the designer theme class obtains its ambient settings from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.AmbientTheme%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty>valor for definido, a classe de designer tema obtém as definições do ambiente de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.AmbientTheme%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.AmbientTheme%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> value is set, the designer theme class obtains its ambient settings from the operating system on which the designer is installed.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty>valor for definido, a classe de designer tema obtém as definições de ambiente do sistema operativo no qual o estruturador está instalado.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty"></xref> enumeration value which the composite designer theme should now use.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty"> </xref> valor de enumeração que agora deve utilizar o tema estruturador composto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the composite designer theme will display drop shadows around the composite activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o tema estruturador composto vai apresentar largar sombras em torno do Estruturador da atividade composta.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme"></xref> displays drop shadows around the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme"> </xref> apresenta drop sombras à volta a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of the watermark image in the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o alinhamento da imagem de marca de água no <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerContentAlignment"></xref> enumeration value that indicates where in the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> the watermark image will be placed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerContentAlignment"> </xref> valor de enumeração que indica onde no <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> será realizada a imagem de marca de água.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerContentAlignment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerContentAlignment"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the watermark image to use on the composite activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a imagem de marca de água a utilizar o designer de atividade composta.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme.WatermarkImagePath%2A> property value is `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) this property will provide the image for the watermark.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme.WatermarkImagePath%2A>valor da propriedade é `null` (`Nothing` no Visual Basic) desta propriedade irá fornecer a imagem de marca de água.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme.WatermarkImagePath%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme.WatermarkImagePath%2A> property is set to a valid value, this property is set to `null` (`Nothing`).
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme.WatermarkImagePath%2A>propriedade está definida como um valor válido, esta propriedade está definida como `null` (`Nothing`).</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme.WatermarkImagePath%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> object to use as the watermark for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> objeto para utilizar como a marca d'água para o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the relative path to the watermark image to use on the composite activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o caminho relativo para a imagem de marca de água a utilizar o designer de atividade composta.

trans-unit.source: A string value that represents the relative path to the watermark image to use on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de cadeia que representa o caminho relativo para a imagem de marca de água a utilizar o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>.
